comments: Continued fraction of 2+2*sqrt(30)/5. - R. J. Mathar, Nov 21 2011
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,1).
formula: a(n) = -1/2*(-1)^n+9/2 =5*(n mod 2)+4*[(n+1) mod 2]. - _Paolo P. Lava_, Oct 20 2006G.f.: (4+5*x)/(1-x^2). - _Jaume Oliver Lafont_, Mar 20 2009a(n) = floor(9*(n+1)/2) - floor(9*n/2). - _Hailey R. Olafson_, Jul 17 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
